short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the header colour in Xero / Hubdoc based on the active organisation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your experience in Xero and Hubdoc by customising the header colour based on the active organisation.

This extension makes it easier to visually distinguish between multiple organisations, helping you stay organised and reducing the risk of working in the wrong account.

Key Features:

Automatically changes the header colour in Xero and Hubdoc based on the active organisation.
Customizable colours for each organisation to suit your workflow.

Works seamlessly across all Xero and Hubdoc pages.

Take control of your workspace with visual cues that adapt as you switch between accounts, making it effortless to stay on top of your tasks!

Pricing: AUD $4.99/user per month.

Please Note: When configuring the options, you need to ensure the organization name matches your Xero company file name.
